levels.levelDescription: Welcome to the Shadowed Abyss, where the ground is covered in eerie dark-dirt and treacherous deep-dark-holes that threaten to swallow the unwary traveler whole.
Traverse the Spectral Sands, a haunting landscape of pink-sand shimmering under a ghostly light, with mystical waters blocking the path ahead.
Enter the treacherous realm of the Voidwalker, where fractured-wall-platforms float above rivers of molten lava, creating a hazardous path towards the legendary Soulwraith's lair.
